title: Rane Group top management change: L Ganesh to retire, Harish Lakshman to take over as Chairman
description: Rane Group's L Ganesh retires as Chairman, effective March 31, 2024. Harish Lakshman to succeed from April 1, 2024. Ganesh's TQM leadership and awards highlighted in the transition.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
cleaned_content: you can now subscribe to our economic times whatsapp channel
